plot: A son after his mother's death builds a forest on his own after a saint shows him the right place for digging up a well for watering trees.
title: Kaadu
plot_es: A son after his mother's death builds a forest on his own after a saint shows him the right place for digging up a well for watering trees.
plot_en: A son after his mother's death builds a forest on his own after a saint shows him the right place for digging up a well for watering trees.
